title: Bears to hire Lions OC Johnson as new coach
description: Lions offensive coordinator Ben Johnson has agreed to a deal to become the Bears' next head coach.
author: Courtney Cronin

title: McDavid, Myers banned 3 games for cross-checks
description: Edmonton Oilers star Connor McDavid and Vancouver Canucks defenseman Tyler Myers have both been suspended three games for illegal cross-checks.
author: Greg Wyshynski

title: Underdog Djokovic must 'raise his game' for Alcaraz
description: Novak Djokovic, a record 10-time Australian Open champion, finds himself in an unusual position - labelled the underdog when he plays Carlos Alcaraz.

title: 'It's time to accept it - England are nowhere near Australia'
description: England started the Women's Ashes saying they were "not far away" from catching Australia, but the gulf is only getting bigger, writes Ffion Wynne.

title: Live updates: Ohio State, Notre Dame fight for the national championship
description: The first 12-team College Football Playoff has come down to this, with the Buckeyes entering as favorites to beat the Fighting Irish.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Colts reportedly hiring dismissed Bengals DC Lou Anarumo to run defense under Shane Steichen
description: The Bengals fired Anarumo on Jan. 6 after fielding the NFL's 25th ranked defense and missing the playoffs.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Carra: Amorim's Man Utd comments 'bizarre and ridiculous'
description: Jamie Carragher says he was mystified by Ruben Amorim calling his Manchester United team "maybe the worst" in the club's history and believes it could backfire on the head coach.

title: Stick to the plan? Amorim and Ange refuse to adapt as Man Utd and Spurs suffer
description: Adapt or die? Ruben Amorim and Ange Postecoglou seem intent to fall on their sword rather than alter their approaches in the face of adversity.
